DataElement.preferredName: Active Immune Dysregulation Transplantation Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text term to signify whether active immune dysregulation was present at the time of a bone marrow transplant.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Exerting influence or producing an effect; taking part in an activity._A process that acts to control the rate or manner in which another process progresses or a product is formed._Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident._A disorder resulting from an abnormality in the immune system.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Exerting influence or producing an effect; taking part in an activity.:A disorder resulting from an abnormality in the immune system.

Concepts.definition: Exerting influence or producing an effect.
A disorder resulting from an abnormality in the immune system.

Property.preferredDefinition: Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: Transference of a tissue or organ within an individual, between individuals of the same species, or between individuals of different species.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Curated to support NCI CCR Primary Immunosuppression CRF template.10.21.2016.dmr

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.
